settings.text:
Introducing our newest HyperJuice GaN Chargers that power up to 4 devices simultaneously, including pro laptops, tablets, and phones, with their advanced GaN technology. They have everything you need for global travel, thanks to their compact design and included travel adapters. Additionally, they easily transform into a flexible desktop charger with included C8 adapter. Designed for creators, entrepreneurs, and students, our compact, all-in-one solution will let you power through even the most demanding work.

Our cool and efficient GaN technology delivers super-fast charging speeds, enabling you to fast charge a MacBook Pro 16-inch from 0-50% in about 28 minutes.* *Based on 3rd party testing

settings.Imgsub_heading: Introducing our newest HyperJuice GaN Chargers, capable of powering up to 4 devices simultaneously, including laptops, tablets, and phones. Compact and perfect for global travel, they come with travel adapters and a C8 adapter for flexible desktop charging. Designed for creators, entrepreneurs, and students, this all-in-one solution meets even the most demanding needs.

Engineered for commercial-grade performance, our latest chargers operate 22% cooler than leading alternatives, ensuring maximum efficiency. This means your devices won't experience "wattage throttling," where charging speeds decrease due to overheating. We undergo testing at both higher and lower temperature extremes for reliable charging in any climate. Moreover, we prioritize durability by not pushing limits with our chargers, ensuring their long-term reliability.

settings.heading: Go Beyond with Hyper
settings.subheading: Hyper’s mission to Go Beyond with our connectivity and power solutions.

settings.heading: Beyond Performance
settings.subheading: Seamlessly connect your devices, transfer data, and charge quickly and efficiently. HYPER high-performance products, HyperDrive, HyperJuice, and HyperPack, are designed to help you achieve more, faster.

settings.heading: Beyond Peace of Mind
settings.subheading: We have rigorous safety testing standards and adhere to all 3rd party testing requirements to ensure every HYPER solution meets or exceeds all safety parameters, so you and your data remain secure.

settings.heading: 22% Cooler Than a Leading Charger Brand*
settings.description:
The HyperJuice GaN Charger is 22% cooler than leading charger brand. With its efficient thermal management and safe operation, Hyper's advanced GaN (Gallium Nitride) technology allows for more efficient power conversion, leading to a cooler charging experience. This innovation ensures devices are charged quickly and safely.

*HyperJuice 70W charger vs. a leading brand’s 65W charger

settings.heading: Experience Intelligent Fast Charging
settings.description:
Intelligent charging with a Programmable Power Supply (PPS) adapts in real time to deliver the perfect wattage your devices demand. PPS provides a variable amount of power depending on what your device requires.

*Based on charging speeds provided by Apple

settings.heading: Charge Anywhere Around the World
settings.subheading: Interchangeable travel adapters for over 150 countries (US, EU, UK and ANZ) are included, eliminating the need to carry additional converters. Our adapters securely lock into place, providing a more secure solution than adapters that slide over the US plugs.

settings.heading: Transforms Into a Desktop Charging Solution
settings.subheading: Transform your wall charger into a desktop charging station with the included C8 adapter. It provides a more secure attachment to wall outlets and more distance to access additional plugs in locations such as coffee shops, airports, and other public spaces.

settings.heading: Go Beyond Safety
settings.description: Charge safely with industry-leading testing, third-party certifications, and intelligent chips designed to protect against a range of electrical issues, including over-voltage, over-current, over-temperature, and over-powering of your device.

settings.heading: Charge up to 4 Devices Simultaneously
settings.description: Charge up to 4 devices simultaneously, including your laptop, phone, tablet, or headphones, with a total output of up to 145W. Ideal for meeting rooms, sharing power with friends, and ensuring all your devices stay fully charged wherever you travel.

settings.Imgsub_heading: Designed to intelligently distribute power to multiple devices simultaneously, ensuring power is dynamically allocated to each device.

settings.heading: 100W USB-C GaN Travel Charger with 4 Ports
70W USB-C GaN Travel Charger with 3 Ports
